amendment.description: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 37 in the Congressional Record of June 19, 1996 to delete the provison in the bill that provides a contingent appropriation of $861 million for the Superfund program.

action.text: Mr. Oxley raised a point of order against the Pallone amendment (A017). Mr. Oxley stated that the amendment constituted a violation of section 302(f) of the Congressional Budget Act. The Chair sustained the point of order.
